mapper.select: SELECT * FROM HISTORY WHERE SEQ in( SELECT SEQ FROM FRIENDS WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} OR SUB_NO = #{userNo} )
SELECT TYPE, count(TYPE) as COUNT FROM HISTORY WHERE SEQ in( SELECT SEQ FROM FRIENDS WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} OR SUB_NO = #{userNo} ) GROUP BY TYPE

select count( CASE WHEN (MINUTE(REG_DT) between 0 and 4) then 1 end) as ONE, count( CASE WHEN (MINUTE(REG_DT) between 5 and 8) then 1 end) as TWO, count( CASE WHEN (MINUTE(REG_DT) between 9 and 12) then 1 end) as THREE, count( CASE WHEN (MINUTE(REG_DT) between 13 and 16) then 1 end) as FOUR, count( CASE WHEN (MINUTE(REG_DT) between 17 and 20) then 1 end) as FIVE, count( CASE WHEN (MINUTE(REG_DT) between 21 and 23) then 1 end) as SIX from history where SEQ in (select SEQ from friends where USER_NO =#{userNo} or SUB_NO =#{userNo})

select count( CASE WHEN (REG_DT between DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 WEEK ) AND NOW()) then 1 end) as ONE, count( CASE WHEN (REG_DT between DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -2 WEEK ) AND DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 WEEK )) then 1 end) as TWO, count( CASE WHEN (REG_DT between DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -3 WEEK ) AND DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -2 WEEK )) then 1 end) as THREE, count( CASE WHEN (REG_DT between DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -4 WEEK ) AND DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -3 WEEK )) then 1 end) as FOUR, count( CASE WHEN (REG_DT between DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -5 WEEK ) AND DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -4 WEEK )) then 1 end) as FIVE from history where SEQ in (select SEQ from friends where USER_NO =#{userNo} or SUB_NO =#{userNo})
